original_text: I sent great fear on your enemies as you moved into the land. I chased them all away, as well as the two kings of the Amorites. You did not win because of your strong weapons, but because of me.
korean_text: 내가 왕벌을 너희 앞에 보내어 그 아모리 족속의 두 왕을 너희 앞에서 쫓아내게 하였나니 너희의 칼이나 너희의 활로써 이같이 한 것이 아니며

sentences.original_text: I sent great fear on your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 원수에게 큰 두려움을 보냈다

sentences.original_text: as you moved into the land
as well as the two kings of the Amorites
You did not win because of your strong weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 강한 무기 때문에 이기지 않았다
